alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, southern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and west central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 506 PM EDT/406 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Blountstown to 7 miles east of Callaway. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Honeyville, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Chipola Cutoff, Hosford, Red Hill, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Kinard, Hugh Creek, Chipola Park, Telogia, Red Oak and Sharpstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
